Name: The Struggles Of Stefan
About the game: A 2.5-dimensional platformer with a plot of accepting life choices, and their potential ramifications. Acquire particular items to accomplish each level quicker & easier. Basic controller mechanics. Multiple chapters consisting of numerous themes.
